messages.message:
hey team, do we know if anyone / anything is using the python dependency `msgpack`? I need to upgrade it for installing ray in `api-server-apps`  (as part of our work in moving model training to ray <#C048Q7T3NDN|>)

A monorepo-wide search yielded me nothing but requirements.txt files :joy:

cc @Yiqing
ultimate test will be remove it and deploy it to sandbox
That doesn’t work with python, i’s not compiled :(
well i need to upgrade it, not delete it actually - since ray depends on msgpack (but a higher minimum version than what we have now)
? but it will error out in rollout, no?
Ah okay, ray does need it. never mind, no deleting

it won’t fail until something hits the line of code that uses msgpack, so if it’s not used during initialization of a service, rollout will succeed. This happens quite frequently, the deployment is green, but if you look at the logs, you’ll see “missing import… “. We can run our test suites to touch as much code as possible to verify
I guess it should be fine to upgrade to 1.0.4 as the major breaking changes in 1.0+ seems doesn’t impact us if there is no usage
